Assessment.QuestionText: You want to display a message box stating that "<font face="courier new">Five seconds are over</font>" at every five second interval using a timer. Which one of the following codes will help you to achieve this?

Options.Option:
Timer tmrCounter = new Timer();
tmrCounter.Interval = 5000;
tmrCounter.Start();

private void tmrCounter_Ticks(Object sender, EventArgs e)
{
   MessageBox.Show("Five seconds are over");
}
